info.title: Table API
info.description: Allows you to perform create, read, update and delete (CRUD) operations on existing tables

parameters.name: sysparm_query
parameters.description: An encoded query string used to filter the results

parameters.name: sysparm_display_value
parameters.description: Return field display values (true), actual values (false), or both (all) (default: false)

parameters.name: sysparm_exclude_reference_link
parameters.description: True to exclude Table API links for reference fields (default: false)

parameters.name: sysparm_suppress_pagination_header
parameters.description: True to supress pagination header (default: false)

parameters.name: sysparm_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return in the response

parameters.name: sysparm_limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results returned per page (default: 10,000)

parameters.name: sysparm_view
parameters.description: Render the response according to the specified UI view (overridden by sysparm_fields)

parameters.name: sysparm_query_category
parameters.description: Name of the query category (read replica category) to use for queries

parameters.name: sysparm_query_no_domain
parameters.description: True to access data across domains if authorized (default: false)

parameters.name: sysparm_no_count
parameters.description: Do not execute a select count(*) on table (default: false)
